itemDescription: English photographer, artist, illustrator and print-maker (1828–1892)

wikipedia_page.main: Cecilia Glaisher (20 April 1828 – 28 December 1892) was an English amateur photographer, artist, illustrator and print-maker, working in the 1850s world of Victorian science and natural history.

response: James Whitbread Lee Glaisher FRS FRSE FRAS (5 November 1848, Lewisham – 7 December 1928, Cambridge), son of James Glaisher and Cecilia Glaisher, was a prolific English mathematician and astronomer.  His large collection of (mostly) English ceramics was mostly left to the Fitzwilliam Museum in Cambridge.
